channel.title: Ssh linux command fail? please help
channel.description:
so i got a linux vps and im using ssh and when i go to enter my run code which is
screen -A -m -d -S rsps java -classpath bin:deps/poi.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar:deps/jython.jar:log4j-1.2.15.jar server.Server
nothing happens i just get a line when i press enter that says
[root@bla source]#

item.title: Ssh linux command fail? please help
